items.sentence: I hope that Tom understands French well enough, so I don't have to interpret for him.
If you were only able to meet with one historical figure, who would you like to meet?
How would you feel if you told Tom you loved him, but he told you he didn't love you?
The boss outlined a three-pronged approach to turn the fortune of the company around.
When in doubt tell the truth. It will confound your enemies and astound your friends.
